channel.description: Recent content in Overburn on Harecoded

item.title: Overburning script for Mac OS X, Record large films in Mac
item.description: If you use the Finder burning tool to create your CDs, or an application that doesn't support overburning (surpass a little bit the CD or DVD maximum size) I am sure that some time you got anrgy. Sometimes are films, sometimes it's just one more song in the CD library you are creating... The thing is that you have 703MB and you cannot burn a 700MB CD. It won't happen again!
